text: The Hoboken Thourots were an American basketball team based in Hoboken, New Jersey that was a member of the American Basketball League. After 4 winless games, the team moved to Camden to become the Camden Brewers on November 23, 1933. ==Year-by-year== {| class="wikitable" !Year !League !Reg.
